mapper.select: SELECT hqr.member_id AS memberId, hqr.questionnaire_id AS questionnaireId, hqr.answer_index AS answerIndex, hqr.create_time AS creatTime, hq.language AS language, hq.subject AS subject, hq.options AS options FROM home_questionnaire_result AS hqr LEFT JOIN home_questionnaire AS hq ON hqr.questionnaire_id = hq.id WHERE hqr.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY hq.sort
